subject: Suggestions for electronics tutorials?
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
I was wondering if anyone knew of any good online electronics tutorials 
(schematics, building, etc...). Once upon a time I used to know how to 
read circuit schematics being a ham radio operator, but that was a very 
long time ago. I would certainly like to refresh my knowledge and 
attempt completion of my own projects based on some of the schematics 
here. Modifying existing devices comes easy for me, but starting from 
scratch leaves me scratching my head...

thanks in advance
Andy
